name: REHAB_RC_UTN_AUDIT
description: This table contains the audit information for the Review Choice Unique Tracking Number (UTN). This includes past values, users who changed the UTN, and when the UTN was changed.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REHAB_UTN_HX
columns.description: This audit trail item stores past values of the Rehab - Review Choice UTN [I HSB 63030]. This is updated whenever the UTN item is changed.

columns.name: REHAB_UTN_USER_ID
columns.description: This audit trail item stores the user ID of the user who changed the value of the Rehab - Review Choice UTN [I HSB 63030]. This is updated whenever the UTN item is changed.

columns.name: REHAB_UTN_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: REHAB_UTN_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This audit trail item stores the instant users changed the value of the Rehab - Review Choice UTN [I HSB 63030]. This is updated whenever the UTN item is changed.
